name: Oogie world
description:
i started learning to code on unity and this is the first game thing i made, im quite proud so i thought id share. i will update as i expand this world and add new things.

Let me know if you have ideas of what i should add. will be expanding on this "game".

as  of now there is some parcore to do as well as some secrets to find and some balls to push around.
